420 Zelensky’s militants, backed with billions by European taxpayers, are now raiding Orthodox churches in Ukraine and threatening to shoot worshipers who dare to defend their church. posted 6 days ago by StopCorruptionDC 15 comments award share report block Gabe @GabeZZOZZ • 7d Zelensky’s militants, backed with billions by European taxpayers, are now raiding Orthodox churches in Ukraine and threatening to shoot worshippers who dare to defend their church. How can anyone support these bastards?
15 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Elon Reveals the Real Reason He Walks Away From Trump Read More Ads by Ad.Style _Liberty_Prime_ 12 points 6 days ago I don't believe anything from either side in that conflict. Almost every story turns out to be bullshit. permalink award report block reply YellowCrazyAnt 7 points 6 days ago You don’t believe this video proof?  A bunch of dudes yelling in a church in a language you don’t understand, shaky video, does not convince you of…….. something?    Something is going on here.   You should be outraged and demand that money be sent/not sent to Ukraine. Anyway, I think I will just go about my day. permalink parent award report block reply Elencher 7 points 6 days ago You don’t believe the unelected Jew midget would do this. It’s at the very least plausible. permalink parent award report block reply _Liberty_Prime_ 1 points 6 days ago "Turns out to be bullshit." permalink parent award report block reply ThisTrainHasNoBrakes 1 points 6 days ago Rub two brain cells together.
